Double Punch/Injector/Pyor/Breakdown/Scavenger/Manterror:



Double Punch saw the growing number of enemies going in the Ark after his 
comrades.  Running in through the breach in the hull, he rolled, still in a 
cloaked mode.  Getting to his feet, he slowly came up, behind Ramhorn and 
Beachcomber.  Raising his pinchers, he fired two missiles each, sending the 
Maximals "flying" forward, in the way of some of the autogun fire, going 
unconsciouss.

---

Breakdown, Pyro, and Scavenger had stuck together, weapons raised.  They were 
prancing through the Ark like they owned it, looking for the Predacons that 
had gotten in.
